-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Licensing Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Versions **1.2.0-beta and earlier** were released under the MIT License.
  These versions remain permanently available under MIT terms.

- Version **1.2.0-beta1 and later** are released under the GNU General Public License,
  version 3 (GPLv3). All future releases of Argx will follow GPLv3 terms.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Summary
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Anyone using or redistributing Argx **1.2.0-beta or earlier** may continue to do
  so under the MIT License.
- Anyone using or redistributing Argx **1.2.0-beta1 or later** must comply with the
  GPLv3 License.
- This transition ensures that Argx remains free software while protecting the
  rights of contributors and users.

For full details, please refer to:

- MIT License:     https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT
- GPLv3 License:   https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html
